content:
I like this puzzle. I have made some minor edits to correct grammar in a few places, and I have solved it in C#.

I have a question, though. Apparently, the plural of pegasus is pegasi, according to several sources including:

https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/Pegasus

Since all the species are plural (Rabbits, Cows, etc.), do you want to change "Pegasus" to "Pegasi" or do you want to leave it? I can understand either decision since this is such a nonstandard usage.

I suspected it but I wasnâ€™t sure.
Thanks.
No problem. I have voted to approve this puzzle.
